title:
SWAP and Transpose by displacements, Stabilizer Renyi entropies for
  continuous variables and qudits and other applications
abstract:
In this note, I highlight a useful formula for the SWAP operator as an
average of anti-correlated Heisenberg-Weyl displacements, valid for
arbitrary-dimensional quantum systems. As an application I show how the
relation can be used to quickly prove normalization identities for the Weyl
function, and apply the result to Weyl magic and Wigner magic as the
generalization of the recently suggested Renyi Stabilizer entropy to q-dits and
CV.
